summary.span: 命名空間包含管理遠端物件存留期 (Lifetime) 的類別。

span.span: The namespace contains classes that manage the lifetime of remote objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳統上，分散式記憶體回收會使用參考計數和抓取物件的存留期的控制。Traditionally, distributed garbage collection uses reference counts and pinging for control over the lifetime of objects. 這適用於時有一些用戶端，每個服務，但不延展性也有數千個每個服務的用戶端。This works well when there are a few clients per service, but doesn't scale well when there are thousands of clients per service. 遠端存留期服務租用關聯每個服務，以及其租用的時間到期時，會刪除服務。The remoting lifetime service associates a lease with each service, and deletes a service when its lease time expires. 在傳統的分散式記憶體回收行程，函式會採用存留期服務並妥善調整每個伺服器的用戶端數目增加時。The lifetime service can take on the function of a traditional distributed garbage collector, and it also adjusts well when the numbers of clients per server increases. 每個應用程式定義域包含負責控制其網域中的租用的租用管理員。Each application domain contains a lease manager that is responsible for controlling leases in its domain. 所有租用會定期都檢查到期的租用時間。All leases are examined periodically for expired lease times. 如果租用到期時，會叫用一或多個租用贊助者，並有機會更新租用。If a lease has expired, one or more of the lease's sponsors are invoked and given the opportunity to renew the lease. 無贊助者決定更新租用時，如果租用管理員移除租用，並可在記憶體回收行程收集物件。If none of the sponsors decides to renew the lease, the lease manager removes the lease and the object can be collected by the garbage collector. 租用管理員維護租用租用依照剩餘的租用時間。The lease manager maintains a lease list with leases sorted by remaining lease time. 以最短的剩餘時間的租用會儲存在清單頂端。The leases with the shortest remaining time are stored at the top of the list.
